wikipedia_page.main: Vikki Howells is a Welsh Labour politician and former teacher. Since May 2016, she has been the Member of the Senedd for Cynon Valley.

response: * Vikki Howells, a Member of the Welsh Assembly, was a history teacher here prior to her election in 2016
Chapman stood down in 2016 and was succeeded at the 2016 Welsh Assembly elections by Vikki Howells.

link_mentions.page: St John the Baptist School, Aberdare
